Objective

Motivated IT professional with hands-on experience in system administration, hybrid networking, and cybersecurity across cloud and on-premises environments. Currently pursuing a B.S. in Cybersecurity with a focus on Cloud Networking and preparing for CompTIA Network+, Security+, and SecOT+ certifications. Seeking a Level 2 Help Desk or Entry-Level System Administrator role to apply technical support expertise, Active Directory and Azure skills, and a strong focus on network security and log analysis in enterprise environments.
